name: The Wahlberg Solution!
bio:
Musician, Model, Actor, Producer, Entrepreneur, Inspiration, Better Than You.

Mark Wahlberg makes great decisions, he knew when to get out of Rap-Music, he's crafted a perfect body, and he told Donnie to be in a boy-band. After decades of using his knowledge to only benefit himself, Mark has teamed up with other celebrities and friends for "The Wahlberg Solution!" a roundtable discussion of current news and events that will sort out the world's problems as only an A-List celebrity can.
